snippet: McAdoo has filed a lawsuit against the university, saying it failed to provide him and other athletes a quality education by guiding them toward sham classes.
lead_paragraph: McAdoo has filed a lawsuit against the university, saying it failed to provide him and other athletes a quality education by guiding them toward sham classes.

headline.main: Michael McAdoo, Former North Carolina Player, Files a Suit
headline.print_headline: Former North Carolina Player Files a Suit
